description: Two goals from striker Kyle Wootton help Stockport maintain their promotion push in League One with a comfortable win at Exeter.
title: Exeter City 0-2 Stockport County
title_page: Exeter City 0-2 Stockport County - BBC Sport
maintext:
Exeter City have lost each of their last two home Football League games against Stockport County, after losing just one of their prior 15 at St Jamesâ€™ Park (W11 D3).
Stockport County have won four of their last five Football League games against Exeter City (L1), keeping three clean sheets in that time.
Exeter have picked up just seven points in their last seven home league matches (W2 D1 L4) and have shipped two or more goals in eight of their last 12 on home soil.
Stockport have won seven away league games so far this season, last recording more wins on the road in the third tier or higher in 1996-97 (8 in the third tier).
